remarks: The inverse of an element in a subgroup is the same as the inverse in the larger group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
subg0.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
subginv.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
subginv.j $e |- J = ( invg ` H ) $.
subginv $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ X e. S ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( J ` X ) ) $.
